Object.Description: The Pathfinder is a balanced bowman who aims to cover all bases.

Ability1.Name: Anomalous Burst
Ability1.Description: Shoot a flurry of &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"6 (+1 per 30 &img="misc_big,0x22") heat seeking void blasts&reset, dealing &type="bold_it"&col="FF6C32"750 (+75% &img="misc_big,0x20") Physical Damage.

Ability2.Name: Paradoxical Shift
Ability2.Description: Become a &type="med_it"Phantom&reset for the next 3 seconds, becoming Invisible to enemies and gaining &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"+25% &img="misc_big,0x22".

Ability3.Name: Swarm
Ability3.Description: &type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"PASSIVE:&reset Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a &type="med_it"Soul Fragment&reset for 5 seconds. &type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"ACTIVE:&reset Convert all &type="med_it"Soul Fragments&reset within 2 tiles of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"50 (+120% &img="misc_big,0x23") damage.&reset Voidlings have &type="bold_it"&col="20AC20"350 (+25% &img="misc_big,0x28") Maximum Health&reset, and lose 75 health every second. &type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

UltimateAbility.Name: Shapeshift
UltimateAbility.Description: Possess the targeted Enemy for the next &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"5 (+7% &img="misc_big,0x3b") seconds&reset, making you control its movements and making it unable to shoot. &type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"During the Shapeshift, your body remains vulnerable to other enemies' attacks.

UltimateAbility.Description: Possess the targeted Enemy for the next &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"5 (+7% &img="misc_big,0x3b") seconds&reset, making you control its movements and making it unable to shoot. &type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"During the Shapeshift, your body remains vulnerable to other enemies' attacks.

Object.Description: The Juggernaut is a sword user who specializes in defense.

Ability1.Name: Anomalous Burst
Ability1.Description: Shoot a flurry of &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"6 (+1 per 30 &img="misc_big,0x22") heat seeking void blasts&reset, dealing &type="bold_it"&col="FF6C32"750 (+75% &img="misc_big,0x20") Physical Damage.

Object.Description: The Chronomancer is a staff class who is able to turn back time.

Ability1.Name: Time Dilation
Ability1.Description: All enemies and projectiles within &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"4 (+6%&space&img="misc_big,0x23")&reset tiles of you move 30% slower for &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"10 (+12% &img="misc_big,0x3b")&reset seconds.

Ability2.Name: Rewind
Ability2.Description: Rewind time by &type="bold_it"&col="FFE770"3 (&col="6080FF"+6% &img="misc_big,0x3b", &col="1C40FF"+6% &img="misc_big,0x27", &col="A15AFF"+6%&space&img="misc_big,0x23"&col="FFE770")&reset seconds, causing you to return to your old position and Health. (if higher than current)

Ability3.Name: Null Pulse
Ability3.Description: Destroy all enemy projectiles within &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"3 (+12% &img="misc_big,0x3b")&reset tiles, causing the enemies that created them to take &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"5 (+6% &img="misc_big,0x23")&reset times the damage.

UltimateAbility.Name: Time Lock
UltimateAbility.Description: Become immune to damage, unable to move, shoot and use abilities for &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"15 (+12% &img="misc_big,0x3b")&reset seconds, storing all damage taken. Return double the damage stored as a Magic Damage blast within &type="bold_it"&col="6080FF"9 (+6%&space&img="misc_big,0x3b")&reset tiles after this effect ends. &type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Damage is capped at &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"30000 (+1000% &img="misc_big,0x23")&reset.

Object.Description: The Enigma is proficient with all styles but their base stats are low.

Ability1.Name: Anomalous Burst
Ability1.Description: Shoot a flurry of &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"6 (+1 per 30 &img="misc_big,0x22") heat seeking void blasts&reset, dealing &type="bold_it"&col="FF6C32"750 (+75%&space&img="misc_big,0x20") Physical Damage.

Ability2.Name: Paradoxical Shift
Ability2.Description: Become a &type="med_it"Phantom&reset for the next 3 seconds, becoming Invisible to enemies and gaining &type="bold_it"&col="C45860"+25% &img="misc_big,0x22".

Ability3.Name: Swarm
Ability3.Description: &type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"PASSIVE:&reset Enemies killed near the Enigma leave behind a &type="med_it"Soul Fragment&reset for 5 seconds. &type="bold"&col="7A6D6A"ACTIVE:&reset Convert all &type="med_it"Soul Fragments&reset within 2 tiles of your cursor into Voidlings. Voidlings chase the closest enemy, attacking them for &type="bold_it"&col="A15AFF"250 (+150% &img="misc_big,0x23") damage.&reset Voidlings have &type="bold_it"&col="20AC20"600 (+25% &img="misc_big,0x28") Maximum Health&reset, and lose 75 health every second. &type="med_it"&size="10"&col="736562"Soul Fragments are shared between all Enigmas in the same instance.

UltimateAbility.Name: Shapeshift
UltimateAbility.Description: Transform into another chosen class, granting access to their Ultimate.
